English:

Category: MAC Software 
Language: All including English, Spanish, Catalan, etc. 

Description: 
------------- 
OS X Lion is the new major version of Mac OS X desktop operating system more advanced in the world. Includes over 250 new features that will transform how you interact with your Mac Touch, slide and move the way through its fluid applications Multi-Touch gestures make everything feel more natural and direct. Full screen applications take advantage of every pixel on the screen - perfect for reading email, surfing the web or browse photos. Launchpad gives you instant access to all applications on your Mac in a stunning new design where you can quickly find and open any application with one click. And Mission Control brings together state, full-screen applications, desktop, and spaces in a unified experience. With a gesture, zoom, desktop, showing a panoramic view of everything that runs on your Mac and it is easy to navigate anywhere with a click. 

Minimum requirements: 
------------------- 
Intel Core 2 Duo, i3, i5 and i7 
2GB RAM 
Mac OS X 1.6.6 
7GB free hard disk will 

AS recording to DVD: 
-------------------------- 
You go to the unzipped file, right click and "show package contents" We went into the folder Contents / SharedSupport and find the file of 3.74 GB InstallESD.dmg, we go to "Disk Utility" and recorded it. Success!

COMO LO GRABO EN UN DVD:
-------------------------- 
Te vas al archivo descomprimido, boton derecho y "mostrar contenido del paquete" Entramos en la carpeta Contents / SharedSupport y buscamos el archivo InstallESD.dmg de 3,74 GB, nos vamos a "utilidad de disco" y lo grabamos. Listo!

COMO LO INSTALO DESDE 0:
-------------------------
Deberemos crear obligatoriamente un DVD como ya he descrito. Una vez creado, lo insertamos, le damos click al icono de Lion del DVD, le damos a instalar, le dejamos esos 20 min que instale y al reiniciar PULSAMOS ALT, le damos a RECOVER HD, luego a Utilidad de discos y borramos el disco principal donde vamos a instalarlo
